title: Serious Sam 3 BFE Repack PC Game
description:
Release Date: 22 November, 2011
Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Developer: Croteam
Publisher: Devolver Digital
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: Serious Engine 3.5
Steam User Rating: 90% of user reviews are positive (based on 7,924 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian
Audio Language: English, Russian
Crack: built-in (CPY)

Minimum requirements:
Operating System: Windows XP 32-bit (with service pack 2 or 3)
Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
RAM: 1 GB
Video Card: nVidia GeForce 7800/7900/8600 series, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 or 1800/X1900 series
DirectX: 9.0c
HDD Space: 5.2 GB (~15 GB during installation)
